title: Paper Production, All Grades for United States
notes:
Series Is Presented Here As Two Variables--(1)--Original Data, 1918-1942 (2)--Original Data, 1942-1964. Coverage Was Increased To Include Building Paper Manufacture. U.S.D.A. Facts For Industry Series M14A Becomes Series M26A In 1957. Source: U.S. Department Of Commerce, Bureau Of The Census, Facts For Industry, Series 24-2-25, For 1942-1945 Data; Series M14A-06, For January-August 1946 Data; Series M14A, For September 1946 On.

This NBER data series m01105b appears on the NBER website in Chapter 1 at http://www.nber.org/databases/macrohistory/contents/chapter01.html.

NBER Indicator: m01105b
